reviewText: Trevor Noah was not someone I had heard of before, but I'm thrilled that I tried! He's hilarious!!! Very real and fresh material, and it's good clean comedy. Definitely worth the purchase! You'll want to watch it over and over again.
Title: Trevor Noah: African American

reviewText: Most comedy these days tends to be inflammatory and loaded with vulgar.  Trevor Noah's brand of comedy, on the other hand, is very intelligent and insightful.  I tend to liken his style to that of Franklin Ajaye, Jerry Seinfeld and even Sinbad.On this particular video, much of what he talks about relates to his trek from South Africa to America and his perspectives between the two.  There are keen observations about culture, ethnicity, and society which are delivered with wit and which will leave you laughing out loud.I actually watched the video yesterday afternoon and found myself with tears in my eyes.  I liked it so much that I watched it again when I returned home in the evening.  During this second viewing, I still found myself laughing although I knew what was coming up next in Trevor Noah's presentation.I don't think Trevor Noah is yet a big name on the US comedy scene yet.  However, based upon what I saw in the video, I sense he's got a bright future ahead of him.
Title: Trevor Noah: African American

reviewText: I am a South African living in the US (7 years) so I am a little biased, but this is pretty damn awesome. Comedians depend very much on personal preference, but as long as you are cool with someone playfully taking the piss out of the US attitudes towards race and global politics you should enjoy it. Easily better and less predictable than 95% of the comedy I am exposed to these days.
Title: Trevor Noah: African American

reviewText: Beautiful Intelligent Blackman!...with such keen insight and  a  class of humor that is refreshing!!!....thought provoking truth telling ...he has what makes a Great!!! Comedian....and that is thee ability! to ..Tell!!! a Story!...in a way the audience follows every! word!...I will say that this young Brotha! is..."Blacker"! then many Black people I run into these days that were... born! in America!  and by that I mean....his! state of...CONSCIOUSNESS!!!....and I LOOOOVE!!! his!...Style! of comedy...From A Sista! Born in ...America....Brooklyn!!!! (Smile)....N.Y.Be Blessed always my Young Brotha and....Truth! Teacher!....TEACH!!!(Smile).....
Title: Trevor Noah: African American

reviewText: I really like comedy that's not foul. Trevor Noah is really funny with out the foulness. Looking to see some more of his shows
Title: Trevor Noah: African American
